protocol_name: Chromosome-scale genome assembly of kiwifruit Actinidia eriantha with single-molecule sequencing and chromatin interaction mapping
protocol_name_html: Chromosome-scale genome assembly of kiwifruit Actinidia eriantha with single-molecule sequencing and chromatin interaction mapping
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"514ac","text":"This protocol includes a computational pipeline used in assembly and annotation of Kiwifruit Actinidia eriantha genome.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

Plant physiology 164:513-524.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"8uh54","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"69fi","text":"Masking genome with MITE and LTR libraries","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"56ks9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"cplrn","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"6is38","text":"Identification of novel repeats with RepeatModeler","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"1kd1s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"7qf4f","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":2}],"data":[]},{"key":"cbd62","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"dfglr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5121,"guid":"E1D11220E3D311E88D89CD934319FF98","align":null,"name":"perl MITE_Hunter_manager.pl -i assembly.fasta -n 64 -c 64 -S 12345678

cat genome_Step8_*.fa genome_Step8_singlet.fa > MITE.lib","description":"","os_name":"","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"2F937E40E3D311E88D89CD934319FF98","command":""}},{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5122,"guid":"B4B1C040E3D411E88D89CD934319FF98","align":null,"name":"RepeatMasker -pa 64 -lib MITE_LTR.lib -dir . assembly.fasta","description":"","os_name":"","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"2F937E40E3D311E88D89CD934319FF98","command":""}},{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5123,"guid":"CA4DFA40E3D411E88D89CD934319FF98","align":null,"name":"perl rmaskedpart.pl assembly.fasta.masked 50 > umseqfile

BuildDatabase -name umseqfiledb -engine ncbi umseqfile

RepeatModeler -pa 64 -database umseqfiledb","description":"","os_name":"","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"2F937E40E3D311E88D89CD934319FF98","command":""}}],"guid":"317D97E76E5046738A0DD06E5D682C45","id":681515,"previous_id":681514,"previous_guid":"DF9CF77AB4DE4F3F86BCF62BE9CAE254","section":"Repeat annotation"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cbied","text":"Preparation of transcriptome evidence","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"caq8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"4fq8m","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"2mb6v","text":"Model training with Braker","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"lhi0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2qgq","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":1}],"data":[]},{"key":"5r6gv","text":"Gene prediction and intergration with MAKER-P","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"221cr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"9mp6a","text":"Following protocol in Campbell MS, Law M, Holt C, Stein JC, Moghe GD, Hufnagel DE, Lei J, Achawanantakun R, Jiao D, Lawrence CJ. 2014. MAKER-P: a tool kit for the rapid creation, management, and quality control of plant genome annotations. Plant physiology 164:513-524.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"68d9u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"3vofb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5124,"guid":"A3BA39B0E3D511E88D89CD934319FF98","align":null,"name":"#de novo assembly
Trinity --seqType fq --max_memory 200G --CPU 50 --normalize_reads --left r1.fq --right r2.fq --output trinity_denovo

#genome guided assembly
STAR --genomeDir gd --alignIntronMax 80000 --twopassMode Basic --runThreadN 50 --readFilesCommand zcat --readFilesIn r1.fq r2.fq --outFileNamePrefix mapped_star
Trinity --genome_guided_bam mapped_starAligned.out.s.bam --max_memory 200G --genome_guided_max_intron 80000 --CPU 50 --output trinity_GG

cat Trinity-DN.fasta Trinity-GG.fasta > transcripts.fasta

#stringtie assembly 
hisat2 --dta -p 64 -x assembly.fasta -1 r1.fq -2 r2.fq -S hisat2.map.sam

stringtie hisat2.map.sort.bam -o stringtie.gtf -p 60 

$PASA_HOME/misc_utilities/accession_extractor.pl < Trinity-DN.fasta > tdn.accs

$PASA_HOME/scripts/Launch_PASA_pipeline.pl \
-c $PASA_HOME/pasa_conf/alignAssembly.config \
--MAX_INTRON_LENGTH 60000 \
--cufflinks_gtf stringtie.gtf \
-C -R --CPU 64 \
-g aseembly.fa \
-t transcripts.fasta \
--TDN tdn.accs \
--ALIGNERS blat,gmap","description":"","os_name":"","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"E7190A70E3D411E88D89CD934319FF98","command":""}},{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5125,"guid":"0727DE80E3D611E88D89CD934319FF98","align":null,"name":"braker.pl \
--cores=64 \
--BAMTOOLS_PATH=bamtools-2.4.1-0/bin \
--AUGUSTUS_BIN_PATH=/bin \
--AUGUSTUS_CONFIG_PATH=config \
--AUGUSTUS_SCRIPTS_PATH=/bin \
--genome=assembly.fa \
--species=species \
--softmasking=1 \
--prot_seq=homologous_protein.fa \
--prg=spaln \
--ALIGNMENT_TOOL_PATH=spaln/bin \
--bam=rnaseq.sort.bam","description":"","os_name":"","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"E7190A70E3D411E88D89CD934319FF98","command":""}}],"guid":"6FEB1C5D000C4E88B6BCCE3C54CC78D6","id":681516,"previous_id":681515,"previous_guid":"317D97E76E5046738A0DD06E5D682C45","section":"Gene prediction"}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5bqs9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]},{"key":"2ho29","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"offset":0,"length":1,"key":0}],"data":[]},{"key":"1cgmd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":[{"type":"command","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"id":5126,"guid":"82CB53F0E3D611E88D89CD934319FF98","align":null,"name":"python run_BUSCO.py -i protein.fa -o pep_busco -l embryophyta_odb9\/ -m proteins -c 60\n\npython run_BUSCO.py -i Actinidia_eriantha.chr.fa -o genome_busco -l embryophyta_odb9\/ -m genome -c 60 -sp tomato","description":"","os_name":"","os_version":"","can_edit":true,"step_guid":"5F1861A0E3D611E88D89CD934319FF98","command":""}}],"guid":"8683E8CC33BE49D6A48CFC344F41C4A4","id":681517,"previous_id":681516,"previous_guid":"6FEB1C5D000C4E88B6BCCE3C54CC78D6","section":"BUSCO evalution"}
